item.title: Mute command error [non delta..]
item.dc:creator: @Hextion Hextion
item.description:
@Hextion wrote:

[code] public void writeLog(String data, String file) {
BufferedWriter bw = null;

	try {
		bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("config//" + file + ".txt",
				true));
		bw.write(data);
		bw.newLine();
		bw.flush();
	} catch (IOException ioe) {
		ioe.printStackTrace();
	} finally {
		if (bw != null)
			try {
				bw.close();
			} catch (IOException ioe2) {
				System.out.println("Error writing system log.");
				ioe2.printStackTrace();
			}
	}
}

[/code]
Wasn’t hard.

Read full topic

item.title: Mute command error [non delta..]
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

YOU NEED THE writeLog part.

Without writing the username to the log, it will have nothing to read on initilization.

     [CODE]   if (command.startsWith("mute") && playerRights > 0) {
            try {
                String otherPName = command.substring(5);
                int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                    p.muted = true;
		writeLog(p.playerName, "mutes");
		sendMessage("You have muted "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to mute..");
            }
        }[/CODE]

add the below in your initilization method

if (checkLog("mutes", playerName)) { p.muted = true; sendMessage("You are muted."); }

Read full topic

item.title: Mute command error [non delta..]
item.dc:creator: @God11 God11
item.description:
@God11 wrote:

okay what im saying is the if i have the command like this

[code]}
if (command.startsWith(“mute”) && playerRights > 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                    p.muted = 1;
		p.sendMessage("You were just muted by: "+playerName+"!");
		sendMessage("You have muted "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to mute..");
            }
        }[/code]

it still mutes the char and it can’t yell or talk but logging out and in and it can yell and talk again.
is there a tut correctly tells how to add a working mute? for non delta…

item.title: Mute command error [non delta..]
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

symbol  : method writeLog(java.lang.String,java.lang.String)

Doesnt the error tell you what the problem is in itself? It cant read the writeLog method. Make sure you have it, and its correctly placed.

make sure in your initialize method you have

if (checkLog("mutes", playerName)) { p.muted = true; sendMessage("You are muted."); }

item.title: Mute command error [non delta..]
item.dc:creator: @God11 God11
item.description:
@God11 wrote:

okay i added a mute command and unmute command they both work excpet the mute command when i mute i can’t talk or yell. but if i log out and log in im no longer muted. the mute isnt saving to char file and idk how to save it. also i get this error.

client.java:12297: cannot find symbol symbol : method writeLog(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) location: class client writeLog(p.playerName, "mutes"); ^

heres my mute command

[code] if (command.startsWith(“mute”) && playerRights > 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                    p.muted = 1;
		writeLog(p.playerName, "mutes");
		p.sendMessage("You were just muted by: "+playerName+"!");
		sendMessage("You have muted "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to mute..");
            }
        }

[/code]

please someone help me. oh this is for a non delta source please i can’t find any tuts for mute commands for 317’s non delta
